Methods.Name: addTime
Methods.Description: Adds time (of specified unit of measure) to date

Parameters.Name: time
Parameters.Description: Amount of time to be added (either positive or negative)

Parameters.Name: uom
Parameters.Description: Unit of measure of the time to be added

Methods.Name: addWorkingDays
Methods.Description: Adds number of working days to a date

Parameters.Name: days
Parameters.Description: Amount of working days to be added (only positive values)
